Hempstead.Mitchel Athletic Complex:
The Mitchel Athletic Complex is part of the Mitchel Field complex, located in Uniondale, New York in the United States. Mitchel Athletic Complex was built in 1984 and renovated in 1997; it hosted track and field and soccer events during the 1998 Goodwill Games.
In 2000, the Complex hosted two matches of the 2000 Lamar Hunt U.S. Open Cup.
